channel.title: Pkerz.com - Where The Action Begins - 32GB Dedi
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zfih54.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][URL=http://"http://pkerz.com"]Click To Play[/URL][/SIZE]
[B]Dedicated Server Specifications[/B] [I]4 X 1TB RAID10 Storage 32GB DDR3 Ram Unmetred Premium Bandwith 1GBPS Data Link[/I]
Pkerz Is going to be a pk based server for all those players who enjoy player killing. There will be shops with a slight economy system, these systems will be put in place to keep the game fun and to help advertise the server to get the server noticed. Most items will be spawnable however thieving will be the only true skill in this server. All skills will be completely removed to prevent any lag caused in the server. Cash will be a main item that will be unspawnable as this may be interesting to get some ideas on later developments.
[B]Please note this server is in beta testing and no where near the official release, so for now have fun pking![/B]
[url=http://www.Pkerz.com]Pkerz - Where The Action Begins[/url]
[I]Heres a list of media of what you can expect to see in my latest development.
[/I][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1522568/skilz.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2l7uiw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2du0dud.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34pxb9e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/j5weo5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/dnd7id.png[/img][I]
[B]MORE COMING SOON![/B]
[/I]Kind Regards, Diesel[/CENTER]

item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

Erm, I’m tired of seeing these servers with massive ram and CPU upgrades, the truth is
you don’t need 32GB of ram to run a server

item.title: Pkerz.com - Where The Action Begins - 32GB Dedi
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

Flame_:

Get a good picture of your player base PKing; people tend to be attracted to a server where they can be assured there will already be people waiting for them to get to the fighting.

I will be doing that soon as our playerbase picks up a tad more, please bare in mind it only started yesterday.

Read full topic

[CENTER]

Dedicated Server Specifications
4 X 1TB RAID10 Storage
32GB DDR3 Ram
Unmetred Premium Bandwith
1GBPS Data Link

Pkerz Is going to be a pk based server for all those players who enjoy player killing. There will be shops with a slight economy system, these systems will be put in place to keep the game fun and to help advertise the server to get the server noticed. Most items will be spawnable however thieving will be the only true skill in this server. All skills will be completely removed to prevent any lag caused in the server. Cash will be a main item that will be unspawnable as this may be interesting to get some ideas on later developments.

Please note this server is in beta testing and no where near the official release, so for now have fun pking!
